data.title: Best Movies Like Captain Khorshid
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Captain Khorshid: Mother (1990), The Peddler (1987), The Brick and the Mirror (1966), The Cow (1969), The Tenants (1987), Travellers (1992), The Traveler (1974), Here Without Me (2011), Life and a Day (2016), The Curse (1973)
data.text:
Original name: ناخدا خورشید

Genre: Crime, Drama

Country: Iran

Duration: 118 min.

Story: Captain Khorshid is a sailor who although only having one hand, manages to sail his little boat. In his village, due to its hot climate and hard living conditions, dangerous criminals are sent into exile. They want to escape from the area, so they ask a middleman to strike a deal with Khorshid. Khorshid is asked to illegally take them out of the country with his boat. At first he is reluctant, but because of the hardships of living he accepts the job.
